video_description: The new TV commercial for the Ampera. Featuring freediver William Trubridge, ultramarathoner Scott Jurek and high altitude mountaineer Steve House. Find out what makes them pioneers. Watch the individual features of William Trubridge (http://youtu.be/UnGo001ANkw), Scott Jurek (http://youtu.be/98k8k-udot4) and Steve House (http://youtu.be/Yk67p19Co0Q) too!
